Posts.Content: Alylasley wrote: So they started me on heavy dose chemo and steroid pills, so far im handling it pretty good and better news i only need 4 heavy chemo treatment followed by 12 weeks light! But does anyone have advice and experience on taking care of their nails mine are hurting so much and the cuticles are basically gone, also I'm so hot and sweaty from the steroids it;s the worst any advice on keeping cool Log in to post a reply
